Might & Magic Heroes: Era of Chaos is coming, pre-registrations open on the Play Store (photo)
05 Nov 2019, 17:35 by Vincenzo Ronca
Ubisoft is once again the protagonist in the world of mobile games with the new chapter of Might & Magic Heroes, which makes its appearance on the Play Store.
The game will be called Might & Magic Heroes: Era of Chaos, which can currently be pre-recorded on the Play Store. The central theme is always a strategic role-playing game, with different characters revolving around the hero, the main protagonist of the action. Those who pre-register will receive a Caterina Pirata skin and a legendary package.
It is currently unclear whether the title will also arrive on the iOS platform. Below is the badge to pre-register for the Android version.
